What about Hocus Pocus? Or the Shackle me not?
LOL wtf? a dvd of this? history lesson: there were no dvds in the 80's.

btw, im seeding this for a long time. the video isnt that impressive, but its something every skater deserves to see. a time when skate vids actually had skaters doing runs of tricks, and not 50, 3 sec shots of them grinding a rail.

Skate or die!

Yo GC, thank you very much for this upload.

Rock On.  Thanks so much for this.  This is why I love freedom.  Chk out skateboard kings to go even farther back with Alva and the Dogtown Boys.  I've got vhs copies Santa Cruz Speedballs and a 1987 NSA competition in Arizona.  Bill Danforth rockin' Pogo's.  Coming Soon
Oh Yeah.  Good Quality copy considering the vintage.
